📊

Google Ads 20-Minute Weekly Optimization Checklist

The High-Impact Tasks That Actually Move the Needle

Time Required: 20 minutes
When: Every Monday morning
Impact: Catch issues before they waste budget
🚨

PRIORITY 1: Critical Health Checks

Do these EVERY week. Skip these and you'll waste money. (5 min)

Budget & Tracking

⚠️ If >10% off target, adjust daily budget today

⚠️ If conversions dropped >30%, check tracking immediately

Fix immediately or pause campaign

Performance Red Flags

🎯 If all green, move to Priority 2. If red flags, stop and fix before optimizing.

⚡

PRIORITY 2: Search Terms Cleanup

This single task prevents the most wasted spend. (10 min)

Step 1: Find the Waste (3 min)

Step 2: Add Negatives (5 min)

Step 3: Find Winners (2 min)

💰 This 10 minutes typically saves $500-2,000/month in wasted clicks.

📊

PRIORITY 3: Performance Monitoring

Quick metric checks to spot trends early. (5 min)

Campaign-Level Check

Ad Group Health

Quality Score Spot Check

🔧

IF YOU HAVE TIME: Optimization Tasks

Only do these if Priority 1-3 are clean (Do Monthly)

Extensions Check (5 min)

Ad Copy Refresh (15 min)

Bid Strategy Review (10 min)

📝

DOCUMENT & TRACK

After Each Session

🎯

BENCHMARKS: What's "Good"?

Metric Good Great Poor
CTR 5-8% >10% <3%
CVR 5-10% >10% <3%
Quality Score 7-8 9-10 <6
Search IS >60% >80% <50%
Wasted Spend <20% <10% >30%

⚠️ WHEN TO GO DEEPER

If you see these patterns, schedule a 1-hour deep dive:

  • Conversion volume dropped >50% (tracking issue or market change)
  • CPA increased >50% (auction dynamics changed)
  • CTR below 3% across account (targeting or ad copy problem)
  • Search IS below 50% (budget or Quality Score crisis)

✅ WEEKLY CHECKLIST SUMMARY

Every Week (20 min):

  • ✅ Health checks (5 min)
  • ✅ Search terms cleanup (10 min)
  • ✅ Performance monitoring (5 min)

Monthly (30-45 min additional):

  • Extensions check
  • Ad copy refresh
  • Bid strategy review

Quarterly:

  • Full account restructure audit
  • Competitor analysis (Auction Insights)
  • Landing page overhaul

🚀 PRO TIP

Set a recurring calendar event every Monday at 9 AM. Do this BEFORE checking email. Consistent optimization beats sporadic "big fixes."
